page.title: 15Monica Knight's Day
page.content: Up at 7.15. Made a cup of tea, cut sandwiches for husband and daughter. Brian off to work.S.W.Electricity Board. Son Richard off to Sir B. Lovell School (4th year). Had a bath and washed my hair. Breakfast. Washed breakfast dishes. Sarah off to school. Made our bed,the children made their own. Off to Yate with my sister to exchange a pair of trousers for Sarah. Back to Wick and had coffee with Mum. Then to Sainsburys to do the weekly grocery shopping. Home at 12.30 It was time for lunch. Again we went to Mums. 1.15 Macrame with children at Wick School. Home at 2.45 Did some washing. Prepared the tea. Salad tonight its too hot to cook.6.30 Sunday school practice. Home at 8.p.m. and Brian's brother and wife called to see us. Left at 10.30 p.m. BED!!! QUITE A HECTIC DAY!
